text: The Deathhead Virgin is a 1974 American film. It stars Diane McBain who later called it "the stupidest screenplay I ever had to work with." It was directed by Norman Foster. ==Cast== *Larry Ward *Jock Gaynor *Diane McBain ==References== ==External links== *Deathhead Virgin at IMDb *The Deathhead Virgin at BFI *The Deathead Virgin at Letterbox DVD *Deathhead Virgin at Sinister Cinema Category:1974 television films Category:1974 films Category:American television films Category:American films Category:1974 horror films Category:Horror television films Category:Films directed by Norman Foster
title: The Deathhead Virgin
